collection_holder_name: NPR Illinois 91.9 UIS (Board of Trustees of the University of Illinois)
pageContext.collection_description: Based in the Illinois state capital, most of the archive involves public affairs analysis programs, annual addresses, and news coverage.
pageContext.extent: Daily web postings of news stories (audio/photo/text) since 2011. 200 analog reel recordings. In-depth public policy reports (text) since 1975.
collectionFormats: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
pageContext.collection_usage_statement: May be used for informative purposes without charge. Political or marketing use subject to approval. Any use must site: NPR Illinois Archives, NPR Illinois 91.9 UIS, Springfield.
physical_formats: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
pageContext.creators: Bradley, Richard, 1975-2009 WSSR/WSSU/WUIS,Wheelhouse, William, 2009-2016,WUIS,Crawford, Sean, 2016-,NPR Illinois
